name: Kids Help Phone
description: Canada's only 24/7, national support service. Professional counselling, information, and referrals for young people in English and French.
description_fr: Le seul service de soutien national 24/7 au Canada. Counseling professionnel, information et références pour les jeunes en anglais et en français.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: All youth (5-29) in Canada. Mental health support. Exclusion: None (24/7 anonymous).
access_script: Hi, I'm feeling really overwhelmed right now and just need someone to talk to. Is this a safe place to share?

name: Trans Lifeline
description: Grassroots hotline offering direct emotional and financial support to trans people in crisis. Operated by trans people for trans people.
description_fr: Ligne d'assistance locale offrant un soutien émotionnel et financier direct aux personnes trans en crise. Géré par des personnes trans pour des personnes trans.
synthetic_queries: Coming out advice from trans person
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Trans, non-binary, and questioning individuals. Peer support. Exclusion: Cisgender individuals seeking info (refer to allies line).
access_script: Hi, I'm trans and I'm really struggling with dysphoria today. Can I talk to someone who understands?

name: Hope for Wellness Helpline
name_fr: Ligne d'écoute d'espoir pour le mieux-être
description: Immediate mental health counselling and crisis intervention for all Indigenous peoples across Canada. Available 24/7.
description_fr: Counseling immédiat en santé mentale et intervention de crise pour tous les peuples autochtones du Canada. Disponible 24/7.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: First Nations, Inuit, and Métis peoples across Canada. Culturally competent counselling.
access_script: Hi, I am Indigenous and I'm having a hard time. I'd like to speak with a culturally safe counsellor.

name: Assaulted Women's Helpline
description: 24-hour telephone and TTY crisis line for all women in Ontario who have experienced any form of abuse.
description_fr: Ligne de crise téléphonique et ATS 24h/24 pour toutes les femmes en Ontario ayant subi toute forme de violence.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Women in Ontario experiencing abuse/violence. Exclusion: Men (refer to other lines).
access_script: Hello, I am in an unsafe situation at home and I need to know my options for leaving.

name: Immigrant Services Kingston & Area (ISKA)
name_fr: Services aux immigrants de Kingston et de la région (ISKA)
description: Settlement services for immigrants and refugees. Assistance with housing, employment, language, and community connection.
description_fr: Services d'établissement pour les immigrants et les réfugiés. Aide au logement, à l'emploi, à la langue et à la connexion communautaire.
address: 837 Princess St, Unit 201, Kingston, ON K7L 1G9
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Newcomers, immigrants, refugees in KFL&A. Settlement support. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'm new to Kingston and looking for help with settlement and housing. Do I need an appointment?

name: Trellis HIV & Community Care
description: Support for individuals affected by HIV/AIDS and STBBIs. Harm reduction supplies, education, and stigma-free support.
description_fr: Soutien aux personnes touchées par le VIH/SIDA et les ITSS. Fournitures de réduction méfaits, éducation et soutien sans stigmatisation.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Open to all. Focus on HIV/STBBI and substance use. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'd like to pick up some harm reduction supplies. Do I need an appointment or can I just drop in?

name: One Roof Kingston Youth Hub
name_fr: One Roof Kingston Youth Hub (Carrefour jeunesse)
description: One-stop access to housing, mental health, addiction, and employment services for youth (16-24). Drop-in centre available.
description_fr: Accès unique aux services de logement, de santé mentale, de toxicomanie et d'emploi pour les jeunes (16-24 ans). Centre d'accueil disponible.
synthetic_queries: Mental health help for young adults
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Youth 16-24. Housing, employment, mental health. Drop-in available. Exclusion: Adults 25+.
access_script: Hi, I'm 20 and having a hard time finding a job and a place to live. Can I drop by to see a worker?

name: Victim Services of Kingston and Frontenac
name_fr: Services aux victimes de Kingston et Frontenac
description: 24/7 crisis response and practical assistance for victims of crime and tragic circumstances. VQRP+ funding helper.
description_fr: Intervention de crise 24/7 et aide pratique pour les victimes d'actes criminels et de circonstances tragiques. Aide au financement VQRP+.
synthetic_queries: Police referred me to victim services
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Victims of crime/tragedy in Frontenac. Exclusion: Non-victims.
access_script: Hi, I was recently a victim of a crime and the police mentioned I could call you for support. What kind of help do you offer?

name: Hotel Dieu Hospital Urgent Care Centre
name_fr: Centre de soins urgents de l'Hôpital Hôtel-Dieu
description: Urgent care for non-life-threatening injuries and illnesses (e.g., cuts, burns, broken bones). Open daily.
description_fr: Soins urgents pour blessures et maladies ne mettant pas la vie en danger (coupures, brûlures, fractures). Ouvert tous les jours.
synthetic_queries: See a doctor today not emergency
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Non-life-threatening urgent issues (cuts, breaks). Exclusion: Critical trauma (Go to KGH). Note: Registration closes when capacity reached.
access_script: Hi, I think I have a minor bone break. Are you still accepting patients for today, or is capacity reached?

name: Kingston General Hospital (KGH) Emergency
name_fr: Urgences de l'Hôpital général de Kingston (KGH)
description: 24/7 Emergency Department for life-threatening conditions, trauma, and critical care.
description_fr: Service des urgences 24/7 pour les conditions mettant la vie en danger, les traumatismes et les soins critiques.
address: 41 King Street West, Kingston, ON K7L 2V7
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Life-threatening injuries, trauma, critical care. Exclusion: Minor ailments (Go to Urgent Care/Walk-in).
access_script: Hi, I'm bringing in a friend who is having severe chest pain. Where is the best place to drop them off?

name: KFL&A Public Health Dental Services
name_fr: Services dentaires de santé publique KFL&A
description: Dental care for eligible low-income children and seniors, and emergency dental for social assistance recipients.
description_fr: Soins dentaires pour les enfants et aînés à faible revenu admissibles, et soins d'urgence pour les bénéficiaires de l'aide sociale.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Low-income (HSO/OSDCP) or adults on OW/ODSP with emergency. Exclusion: General public without coverage.
access_script: Hi, I have a severe toothache and I am on Ontario Works. Can I book an emergency appointment?

name: Kingston Community Legal Clinic
description: Free legal advice and representation for low-income residents regarding housing, income assistance (OW/ODSP), and tenants rights.
description_fr: Conseils et représentation juridiques gratuits pour les résidents à faible revenu concernant le logement, l'aide au revenu (OT/POSPH) et les droits des locataires.

provenance.method: Web Search & Verification of Law Focus

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Low-income Kingston residents. Housing, OW/ODSP, Employment law. Exclusion: Criminal/Family law (Refer to Legal Aid).
access_script: Hi, my landlord is threatening to evict me and I'd like to speak to a lawyer about my rights.

name: Salvation Army Housing Help Centre
name_fr: Centre d'aide au logement de l'Armée du Salut
description: Housing listings, eviction prevention grants, and support for those at risk of homelessness. (Formerly Housing Resource Centre).
description_fr: Listes de logements, subventions de prévention d'éviction et soutien pour les personnes à risque d'itinérance.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: At risk of homelessness or low-income. Rent/Utility arrears. Exclusion: Must meet income cap for grants.
access_script: Hi, I'm behind on my rent and worried about losing my apartment. Can I apply for the rent bank?

name: KCHC Transgender Health Care
description: Specialized primary care and hormone therapy initiation for transgender and gender-diverse individuals (Age 12+).
description_fr: Soins primaires spécialisés et initiation à l'hormonothérapie pour les personnes transgenres et de diverses identités de genre (12 ans et plus).
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Trans/Gender-diverse individuals (12+). Self-referral accepted. Exclusion: None stated.
access_script: Hi, I am looking to start hormone therapy. Are you currently accepting new patients for gender-affirming care?

name: Street Health Centre
name_fr: Centre de santé de rue (Street Health Centre)
description: Barrier-free primary care, addiction services, and harm reduction for vulnerable populations. Needle exchange and opioid treatment available.
description_fr: Soins primaires sans obstacle, services de toxicomanie et réduction des méfaits pour les populations vulnérables. Échange de seringues disponible.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Vulnerable populations, substance use, homelessness. Open access. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'm helping a friend who uses substances and I want to find out about your needle exchange hours.

name: Kingston Interval House (Crisis & Shelter)
description: Emergency shelter and 24/7 crisis line for women, children, and youth experiencing violence. Confidential and safe.
description_fr: Refuge d'urgence et ligne de crise 24/7 pour les femmes, enfants et jeunes victimes de violence. Confidentiel et sécuritaire.
synthetic_queries: Safe place for women fleeing abuse
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Women and children escaping violence/abuse. Exclusion: Men (Refer to other shelters).
access_script: I need a safe place to stay tonight away from my partner. Do you have any beds available?

name: Telephone Aid Line Kingston (TALK)
description: Confidential, anonymous listening service for anyone who needs to talk. Open nightly from 6pm to 2am.
description_fr: Service d'écoute confidentiel et anonyme pour toute personne ayant besoin de parler. Ouvert tous les soirs de 18h à 2h.
synthetic_queries: Lonely need someone to talk to
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Anyone needing a listening ear. 6pm-2am. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I'm just feeling really lonely tonight and need someone to listen.

name: Elizabeth Fry Society (Housing Support)
description: Supportive housing and homelessness prevention for women, including those involved in the justice system.
description_fr: Logement avec services de soutien et prévention de l'itinérance pour les femmes, y compris celles impliquées dans le système judiciaire.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Women (18+) at risk of homelessness or in justice system. Exclusion: Men.
access_script: Hi, I am being released soon and will have nowhere to go. Do you have any supportive housing units available?

name: St. Vincent de Paul Society (WearHouse & Pantry)
description: Emergency food pantry and take-out lunch program. Providing groceries, clothing, and household items to those in need.
description_fr: Garde-manger d'urgence et programme de repas à emporter. Fournit épicerie, vêtements et articles ménagers aux personnes dans le besoin.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Anyone in need. Daily lunch & pantry (once/month). Exclusion: None.

name: Lunch by George
description: Drop-in meal program serving free breakfast and lunch. Note: Currently relocating - check website for latest location.
description_fr: Programme de repas sans rendez-vous servant le petit-déjeuner et le déjeuner gratuits. Note: Déménagement en cours - vérifiez le site web.
synthetic_queries: Where to eat for free today
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Anyone hungry. Drop-in breakfast/lunch. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I heard you offer a hot lunch. What time do you start serving?

name: Salvation Army Rideau Heights Food Bank
name_fr: Banque alimentaire Armée du Salut Rideau Heights
description: Emergency food bank and hamper service. By appointment only (Tues/Thurs). Income verification required.
description_fr: Banque alimentaire d'urgence et service de paniers. Sur rendez-vous seulement (mar/jeu). Preuve de revenu requise.

provenance.method: Web Search & Verification of Appointment System

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Catchment area residents (Rideau Heights). Income verification required. By Appointment.

Can't afford food this week due to rent

name: Martha's Table
description: A caring place where people in need can have access to a nutritious meal and find community social support. Serving Breakfast, Lunch, and Dinner.
description_fr: Un lieu bienveillant où les gens dans le besoin peuvent accéder à un repas nutritif et trouver du soutien social. Sert déjeuner, dîner et souper.

provenance.method: Web Scrape & Manual Verification of Hours

synthetic_queries: Place to eat for free downtown
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Anyone in need of a meal. Small fee ($2) or free meal ticket. Social hub.

name: The Good Food Box

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: fresh produce box (low cost). Open to all. Exclusion: Not a free food bank (subsidy available).

name: AMHS-KFLA 24/7 Crisis Line
description: Immediate and urgent support for individuals experiencing emotional or mental distress. Staffed by mental health and addiction specialists.

synthetic_queries: I don't want to be here anymore

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Individuals 16+ seeking non-medical detox from alcohol/drugs. Exclusion: Medical detox needs (refer to hospital).

name: Kingston Youth Shelter

name_fr: Centre d'aide aux agressions sexuelles de Kingston (SACK)

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Survivors of sexual violence (12+). All genders. Exclusion: None.

name: Maltby Centre

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Children/Youth (0-24) in KFL&A. Mental health & autism services. Exclusion: Adults 25+.

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: All residents. Sliding scale counselling. Exclusion: None.

name: Ryandale Shelter

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Adults (18+). Low-barrier shelter services. Housing first approach.

name: Dawn House

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Pregnant individuals without a family doctor. Comprehensive prenatal care. Exclusion: None.

description_fr: Clinique médicale sans rendez-vous pour les patients sans médecin de famille ou ayant des problèmes urgents. Ouvert 7 jours sur 7.

description_fr: Services juridiques gratuits pour les résidents à faible revenu et les étudiants. Aide pour les questions de locataire/propriétaire, appels académiques et infractions provinciales.

eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Residents of Kingston in immediate financial need. Employment assistance. Exclusion: None.

name: Kingston Frontenac Public Library (Central Branch)
description: Public library offering free access to books, computers, Wi-Fi, and community programs. Open to all residents.

name: YMCA of Eastern Ontario
description: Community centre offering fitness, aquatics, day camps, and youth programs. Promoting health and wellness for all ages.

description_fr: Lieu sûr et solidaire pour les enfants et les jeunes. Offre des programmes parascolaires, camps, sports et activités éducatives.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Children and youth. Membership required (often low cost/free access). Exclusion: Adults (except for specific programs).

name: H'art Centre
description: Inclusive arts hub providing opportunities for people with disabilities to study, practice, and produce works in the arts.

name: Ongwanada

name: Kingston Military Family Resource Centre (KMFRC)
name_fr: Centre de ressources pour les familles des militaires de Kingston (CRFMK)
description: Dedicated support for military families. Mental health services, child care, deployment support, and community integration.
description_fr: Soutien dédié aux familles des militaires. Services de santé mentale, garde d'enfants, soutien au déploiement et intégration communautaire.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Canadian Armed Forces members and their families. Exclusion: General public (some programs may be open).
access_script: Hi, my partner is being deployed and I'm looking for support resources for our family.

name: EarlyON Child and Family Centre (KCHC)
name_fr: Centre pour l'enfant et la famille ON y va (KCHC)
description: Free high-quality drop-in programs for families and children from birth to 6 years old. Learn and play together.
description_fr: Programmes sans rendez-vous gratuits de haute qualité pour les familles et les enfants de la naissance à 6 ans. Apprendre et jouer ensemble.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Children 0-6 years and their parents/caregivers. Free. Exclusion: Children over 6.
access_script: Hi, I have a 2-year-old and I'm looking for a playgroup. Do I need to register for the drop-in?

name: Habitat for Humanity Kingston ReStore
description: Home improvement retail store selling new and gently used building materials and furniture. Proceeds support affordable housing.
description_fr: Magasin de rénovation vendant des matériaux de construction et des meubles neufs et usagés. Les profits soutiennent le logement abordable.
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Open to the public. Exclusion: None.
access_script: Hi, I have some furniture I'd like to donate. Do you offer pick-up services?

name: Kingston Access Services (Access Bus)
description: Specialized transit service for persons with disabilities who are unable to use conventional transit.
synthetic_queries: Transit for seniors with mobility issues
eligibility_notes: Inclusion: Registered clients with disabilities preventing use of regular transit. Application required. Exclusion: General public.
access_script: Hi, I'd like to apply for the Access Bus service. How do I start the registration process?
